GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles. topic query filters served array by specified topic. sort_by query can take any of the column names seen below in the example response - defaults to created_at. order query can take asc or desc - defaults to desc

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves the article with the article_id specified in endpoint

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates votes with inc_votes number sent, serves back the article with correctly updated votes total

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves comments associated with article specified by article_id, serves empty array for an article with no comments

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment with article_id defined in endpoint, serves back comment posted

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment and serves no body back

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object specified by parametric endpoint
